name: atomic-qa-note
description: Atomic-QA-Note is an AI-assisted Obsidian plugin that uses the question-answer (QA) card as the smallest thinking/note unit. It help users to quickly create atomic notes based on heuristic QA(https://github.com/Ai-Data-Man/Atomic-QA-Note)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Ai-Data-Man
